meanings.definition: The quality of being characteristic of or suitable for ordinary people.
meanings.sent1: The folkiness of the music made everyone feel at home.
meanings.sent2: I love the folkiness of this small town.
meanings.sent3: The folkiness of the neighborhood potluck brought everyone together.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a touch of folkiness that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The folkiness of the story was heartwarming and relatable.

meanings.definition: The state of being traditional or characteristic of a particular group of people.
meanings.sent1: The folkiness of the festival reminded me of my childhood.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's decor had a charming folkiness to it.
meanings.sent3: The folkiness of the family recipe was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a sense of folkiness that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The folkiness of the ceremony captured the essence of our culture.
